title: looking for a team
body:
hey guys and girls im looking for a team to play on I am unranked right now coz I just haven't wanted to play my 10 games yet but If I could find a team I am willing to play them. last season was in b3 but I did make it to s5 but I got kicked out of s5 due to not playing due to having no internet but that is no problem now but I just couldn't get back to silver 

I main adc but I can play all roles well but if needed I can just play 1 role that the team needs  

so just add me in game plz and we can talk 

ign: whyyS0Seri0us
